function.arguments:
{"message": "
I have successfully completed the task of creating a microagent for the SheepVibes repository. Here's what was accomplished:

## Step 1: Microagent Creation ✅
- Created `code-review-cycle.md` in the `.openhands/microagents` folder
- The microagent provides comprehensive guidance for iterative code review cycles:
  1. Wait 5 minutes for Google Code Assist and other agents to provide feedback
  2. If no comments received, wait 5 more minutes and try one last time
2. Address all code review comments
3. Close the current PR
4. Push the latest changes and open a new PR to trigger fresh reviews
3. Repeat for maximum 10 iterations

## Step 2: Branch Creation ✅
- Created a new branch: `feat/code-review-cycle-microagent`
- Branch name is meaningful and describes the changes
- Successfully avoided duplicate branches

## Step 3: Pull Request Creation ✅
- Successfully pushed changes to GitHub
- Created PR #98: "feat: Add code review cycle microagent"
- Applied appropriate labels: "enhancement" and "documentation"
- Marked PR as ready to review (not draft)

## Result
The microagent has been created and a pull request has been opened at:
https://github.com/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pull/98

The microagent is now ready to guide the iterative code review process as specified, with proper waiting periods and maximum cycle limits.
"}
function.name: finish

args.final_thought:
I have successfully completed the task of creating a microagent for the SheepVibes repository. Here's what was accomplished:

## Step 1: Microagent Creation ✅
- Created `code-review-cycle.md` in the `.openhands/microagents` folder
- The microagent provides comprehensive guidance for iterative code review cycles:
  1. Wait 5 minutes for Google Code Assist and other agents to provide feedback
  2. If no comments received, wait 5 more minutes and try one last time
2. Address all code review comments
3. Close the current PR
4. Push the latest changes and open a new PR to trigger fresh reviews
3. Repeat for maximum 10 iterations

## Step 2: Branch Creation ✅
- Created a new branch: `feat/code-review-cycle-microagent`
- Branch name is meaningful and describes the changes
- Successfully avoided duplicate branches

## Step 3: Pull Request Creation ✅
- Successfully pushed changes to GitHub
- Created PR #98: "feat: Add code review cycle microagent"
- Applied appropriate labels: "enhancement" and "documentation"
- Marked PR as ready to review (not draft)

## Result
The microagent has been created and a pull request has been opened at:
https://github.com/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pull/98

The microagent is now ready to guide the iterative code review process as specified, with proper waiting periods and maximum cycle limits.
